title: The Rangers In The South
description:
The Rangers in the South is a PIXELART ACTION ROGUELIKE RPG set in a beautiful 2.5D world inspired by the SNES classics. Fight and design a unique strategy with hundreds of alternatives to explore different biomes and challenges Insurgency: Sandstorm
EXPLORE Explore a hand-drawn world full of details, discover secrets and points of interest in a game that rewards exploration, with more than 5 biomes, procedurally generated environments, dungeons, and villages.
BUILD YOUR CHARACTER No predefined classes, with hundreds of unique abilities, character traits , and procedurally generated equipment, youâ€™ll have to carve your path through hordes of enemies to make each character unique! Be careful, death is irreversible!
REPLAYABILITY IS THE WAY Death will be your best teacher! Start new characters to discover new possibilities, items, and abilities. But not all is lost! Progress between each character is stored in the form of exploration, items, and gold

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
